channel.title: Somethings wrong! ffs l00k i need bad help!
channel.description: ok i have my ports set to 43594 43594 and on my router i have ip address as 0.0.0.0 do i leave that default like that ifso tell me if not tell me. and i try to log on with my server name that i made and i cant says error connecting to server. but if i change the server ip to 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 i can login whats wrong???

item.title: Somethings wrong! ffs l00k i need bad help!

item.description:
@boxman222 wrote:

i have zyxkel eq-660r router. ive already done start port:43594 end port:43594 ipaddress:0.0.0.0

left the ip address the same.

item.title: Somethings wrong! ffs l00k i need bad help!
item.dc:creator: @BACON555 BACON555
item.description:
@BACON555 wrote:

box… since ur helping me!!! i will help you okay… so ur stuck at port forwarding first thing is what kind of router do u have? if its a lynksys put ur default gateway into ur address bar and type ur “user” and “pass” must be a real user and pass too though lol and re-port forward just change the 162.0.0.0 to 162.0.0.100 and… it worked for me… lol cuz i port forwarded 5555 as well lol to run 2 at once cuz i was going to have 2 worlds one for the ppl wit clients and 1 for the ppl witout but i decided not to and to stick with silabs lol but yaaa… haha

Read full topic

to to start>run type cmd and when the screen comes up type ipconfig

then where it says ip adress thats it. sometimes the last 3-4 didgits chage and that can be annoying. so if u can connect and others cant, thats problly why.
